main event: An observer reported a large green fireball moving rapidly in an arc over Cayuga Lake, New York, on April 3, 1952.
interesting points: The fireball was described as having green flames streaking out., The observer was with a crew chief and a school teacher., The sighting occurred at approximately 9:10 PM., The object moved from the northeast to the northwest., The object was reported to have been fairly sizable.
witness description: a crew chief at Robinson Airlines, a school teacher, and a passenger
